page.title: 04RELIGION
page.content: {The Parish Church}of Crich is{St.Marys .The Vicar is Mr.Bathie.There are three services on a Sunday.There is a choir of 19 members and 26 children attend Sunday School. The Minister of Crich{Baptist Chapel is Mr.Harry Godden.On Sundays there are 2 services and a Sunday School.The clubs are;Bible club,Youth club,Ladies Meeting,Friendship club,Singing group, Fellowship and Coffee for shoppers. {Crich Wesleyan Chapel}has 2 ministers _the Reverends M.Charles and R.Goadby. There is an evening service on Sunday and a meeting on Friday.There is a choir of 12 people. {Crich Carr Methodist Church}holds one service a month.Crich Carr School hold their Carol Service there. {The Church at Lea is Christ Church The Vicar is Mr.Hurst.
